<denchmark-h:h3>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>

In the newest version 0.7.1 you get the error . <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
Install version 0.7.1 from pytorch-ignite Copy Code at the bottom of the page from the doc "From PyTorch to PyTorch Lightning" Run it See error

The example should provide a working MNIST classifier. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/LuposX>@LuposX</denchmark-link> good catch, are you interested in submitting a fix PR?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Borda>@Borda</denchmark-link> The example I described is a <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/williamFalcon/2168a349492a9480f41f9da39ea755cd#file-pl-py>gist</denchmark-link> embedded in the <denchmark-link:https://towardsdatascience.com/from-pytorch-to-pytorch-lightning-a-gentle-introduction-b371b7caaf09>TowardsdataScience</denchmark-link> article to which you get forwarded when you press "From PyTorch to PyTorch Lightning" in the docs. The gist is from <denchmark-link:https://github.com/williamFalcon>@williamFalcon</denchmark-link> and to my knowledge only the author can do a pr to his gist.
It might be a good idea for the future to move the file into this repository and then to relink to this file.
